block.p: FISHMAN--Sylvia. American Friends of The Hebrew University mourn the passing of Sylvia Fishman, beloved wife of Seymour Fishman (z''l) a revered past Executive Director of AFHU. True humanitarians throughout their lives, Sylvia and Seymour Fishman were devoted to Israel, the Jewish people and to The Hebrew University educational community. We extend our deepest sympathies to the couple's children, Steven and Judith, and to the entire Fishman family. American Friends of The Hebrew University Ira Lee Sorkin, Chairman of the Board George A. Schieren, President Peter T. Willner, National Executive Director

FISHMAN--Sylvia. American Friends of The Hebrew University mourn the passing of Sylvia Fishman, beloved wife of Seymour Fishman (z''l) a revered past Executive Director of AFHU. True humanitarians throughout their lives, Sylvia and Seymour Fishman were devoted to Israel, the Jewish people and to The Hebrew University educational community. We extend our deepest sympathies to the couple's children, Steven and Judith, and to the entire Fishman family. American Friends of The Hebrew University Ira Lee Sorkin, Chairman of the Board George A. Schieren, President Peter T. Willner, National Executive Director
